content: 2tr in corner space repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** 1tr in starting space slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beg 4ch flower with yarn f chain 4 slip_stitch into first chain to make a loop then round 1 4ch counts as 1tr 1ch 1tr 1ch 1tr 2ch 3 times 1tr 1ch slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beg 4ch round 2 slip_stitch in chain space 4ch counts as 1tr 1ch 2tr in same space *1tr 1ch skip chain space 1tr ** 2tr 2ch 2tr in corner space repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** 1tr in starting space slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beg 4ch round 3 slip_stitch in chain space 4ch counts as 1tr 1ch 2tr in same space *3tr 1ch skip chain space 3tr ** 2tr 2ch 2tr in corner space repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** 1tr in starting space slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beg 4ch round 4 slip_stitch in chain space 4ch counts as 1dtr 1dtr 2tr in same space *3tr tr2tog 3ch skip chain space tr2tog 3tr ** 2tr 2dtr 2tr in corner space repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** 2tr in starting space slip_stitch into 4th chain of beg 4ch round 5 4ch counts as 1dtr 1dtr 2tr in next dtr *4tr tr2tog 3ch 1dc in chain space 3ch tr2tog 4tr ** 2tr 1dtr in dtr 1dtr 2tr in next dtr repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** 2tr in starting st slip_stitch into 4th chain of beg 4ch round 6 1ch 1dc in same st *4ch 1dc in next dtr 3ch skip 3 1dc 3ch skip 3 1dc in chain space 3ch skip double_crochet 1dc in chain space 3ch skip 3 1dc 3ch skip 3 ** 1dc in dtr repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** slip_stitch into top of starting double_crochet round 7 slip_stitch in chain space 1ch 1dc 4ch 1dc in same space *3ch skip double_crochet 1dc in chain space 3ch skip double_crochet 5 times ** 1dc 4ch 1dc in corner space repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** slip_stitch into top of starting double_crochet round 8 slip_stitch in chain space 3ch counts as 1tr 2tr 2ch 3tr in same space * skip double_crochet 4tr in chain space 3 times 1tr in double_crochet 4tr in chain space skip double_crochet 3 times ** 3tr 2ch 3tr in corner space repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** sl st into 3rd chain of beg 3ch joining if you haven t done so already weave in any renaming ends from your squares and block them if necessary all joins are made using yarn g the squares in this blanket are all joined with crochet stitches worked from the front the stitches are joined together using double_crochet stitches which are made into the front loops only refer to the layout
